column1: #Food technology ISO Standard by ISO: International standard by ISO which provides a terminology for processes in the foodindustry, including food hygiene and food safety, food products in general, methodsof tests and analysis for food ICS (International Classification for Standards) products,materials and articles in contact with foodstuffs and materials and articles in contact with drinking water, plants and equipment for the food industry.
